name: Classics Out Of Control [GMTK Game Jam 2020]
name_original: Classics Out Of Control [GMTK Game Jam 2020]
description:
Install instructions

Make sure to download the appropriate file based on what operating system you have

  1. Click on the .zip file and extract to a place where you can access the file 
  2. Open the folder you just extracted
  3. Click Classics Out of Control.exe or Classics Out of Control.app to be able to play this game any time (If you're on windows you may also make a shortcut and move that to your desktop or somewhere else instead of always opening that folder to play every time) 
  4. Enjoy your new game :)

(You may have to click allow or approve multiple times during this process due to this being an application not made by an official developer)
